colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (DE LTAR 'DI PHYI GNYIS KAR PHAN PA'I MAN NGAG DGE BSNYEN GYI BSLAB BYA'I NGO SPROD SDUG BSNGAL KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGAR CHEN GYI BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG RDO RJES 'OL CHED DANG BLO BZO DOR NAS 'DUL BA'I GZHUNG RNAMS LAS RANG BLOS GANG SPOBS KYIS BTU SA TE SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,,) ,,'DI NYID SPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I RGYU SBYOR BA, ,BZO BOR BCAS PA DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS KYI, ,TSUL KHRIMS MCHOG DANG NAM YANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,RNAM 'DREN STOBS BCU'I DBANG PHYUG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,`TING NGE 'DZIN RGYAL PO LAS, NGAS NI RAB TU BZANG PO'I CHOS BSHAD KYANG, ,KHYOD KYIS THOS NAS YANG DAG MA SPYAD NA, ,NAD PA SMAN GYI RGYAL BA THOGS PA DAG ,BDAG GI NAD NI GSO BAR MI NUS BZHIN, @022A *, ,ZHES DANG, LHAG BSAM BSKUL BA LAS, BU RAM SHING SHUN SNYING PO CI YANG MED, ,DGA' BAR BYA BA'I RO NI NANG NA 'DUG ,SHUN PA ZOS PAS MIS NI BU RAM RO, ,ZHIM PO RNYED PAR NUS PA MA YIN NA, ,JI LTAR SHUN PA DE BZHIN SMRA BA STE, ,RA LTA BU NI 'DI LA DON SEMS YIN, ,DE LTA BAS NA SMRA LA DGA' SPANGS TE, ,RTAG TU BA GA-YOD BYOS LA DON SEMS SHIG ,CES GSUNGS, ,'DI NYID SKYABS MGON MTSUNGS MED RJE BTZUN LNGA PA CHEN POS GRA MANG LA GZIGS RTOG GYIS ZHES THUGS BRTZE BA CHEN POS STZAL BA YIN LAGS,, ,,
